easy.q: I have a tail but I’m not a cat. I ring but I’m not a bell. What am I?
easy.hint: I soar in the sky with a string.

medium.q: I start with a ring, grow a line, and end with a dot. If you count me, I’m never too late. What am I?

hard.q: Two siblings share a single birthday yet celebrate on different days. They were born in different places but at the same moment. How is this possible?
hard.a: They were born in different time zones
hard.hint: Consider how time varies across maps.
